body_html:
Thanks @andrewcmyers !

(FYI @karllessard @kbsriram @jhseu )

Will take a more detailed look at this, but can we avoid the dependency on perl and having to generate source files? In this particular case, I feel that manually repeating some lines for each type in the Tensor and related classes is worth the benefit of having the .java files be checked in and avoiding a complication in the build step. Or do you disagree? :)

Or do you disagree? :)
body:
Thanks @andrewcmyers !

(FYI @karllessard @kbsriram @jhseu )

Will take a more detailed look at this, but can we avoid the dependency on `perl` and having to generate source files? In this particular case, I feel that manually repeating some lines for each type in the `Tensor` and related classes is worth the benefit of having the `.java` files be checked in and avoiding a complication in the build step. Or do you disagree? :)
